title: Special trade
brief_description: A story about a friendship between a young girl and her grandfather. As a baby, the young girl was taken for outings and taught to walk by her grandfather. Then, one day he returns home from the hospital in a wheelchair and it is the young girl’s turn to take her grandfather for walks. Based on the book entitled “Special Trade” by Sally Whitman.
